content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ want a relaxing crochet shawl with a beautiful repeat i mean you can t say no to that right when i was on the wecrochet website something that happens a lot i was looking at these two colors of yarn and thought they would go beautiful together as a shawl so they jumped right onto the delivery truck and i stalked the mailman until i could have the pretties to whip up the hawthorne tonal crochet shawl **crochet hook ** size us h 5 0 mm 1 **notions ** removable stitch markers 3 yarn needle to weave in ends tassel maker 2 **yarn ** hawthorne speckle hand painted in colorway spark color a - 1 hank hawthorne tonal hand painted in colorway slate color b - 1 hank **yardage ** 675 yards 617 m 2 balls of yarn **abbreviations/stitches ** chain chain half_double_crochet half_double_crochet magic_ring magic_ring single_crochet single_crochet st s stitch es repeat repeat rs right side ws wrong side **gauge** 16 sts and 18 row = 4 10 cm in moss stitch **measurements/sizes ** one size adjustable depth 26 inches 66 cm width 54 inches 137 cm when blocked **skill level ** easy/ beginner the pattern on the blog the free version of this
